name: Fresh Field
description:
My 2nd Game jam game, created in godot. The song for this jam had a happy vibe to it, so i made a game based around being happy!

Click and drag crops to one of the 9 center slots, every 12 seconds, you will receive a new income of crops, which costs money. When crops are fully grown, they'll provide happiness, or, you can drag the fully grown crop to the truck in the bottom left to gain some income. Reach 100 happiness to win! if you can't buy new crops, you lose. The music will also get louder the happier you become. At 40 happiness you unlock flowers, and at 40 coins, you unlock mushrooms. When you unlock mushrooms, you have to pay an extra 5, when you unlock flowers, you have to pay an extra 10.

Crops:

Watermelon: Gives you 8 happiness and can be sold for 5 coins

Beet: Gives you 4 happiness and can be sold for 10 coins

Flower: Gives you 16 happiness, takes 2x as long to grow, and can't be sold

Mushroom: Can be sold for 20 coins, takes 2x as long to grow

Good luck, and thanks for playing!
